snippet: London businesses would be hurt the most, said a report.
abstract: London Chamber of Commerce and Industry publishes report finding that new European tax on financial transactions, known as 'Robin Hood' tax, would fall disproportionately on British firms; tax joins growing list of financial issues dividing Continent and British government.
lead_paragraph: London businesses would be hurt the most, said a report.

headline.seo: British Group Criticizes European Transaction Tax Plan
headline.main: British Lobbying Group Condemns a Proposed European Financial Transaction Tax
headline.print_headline: British Group Condemns a Proposed European Financial Transaction Tax
